document_data.caption: A map showing the Specterwalk and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Specterwalk
document_data.mainbody: The '''Specterwalk''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Specterwalk was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The road ran east to west, originating in the west on the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] and cutting east to end on [[Wall Street]] near the outer city wall. Other roads connecting with the Specterwalk included [[Caravan Street]], [[Carter's Way]], and several smaller unnamed alleys.
